name: GOTTA GO FAST!!!!!
text: IF YOUR NEXT ACTIVATION WOULD DEAL ME 10 OR MORE I DODGE IT!!!!!

name: PSHHH, NOTHIN PERSONNEL KID
text: IF THERE ARE NO CHARACTERS ON MY BOARD, I GAIN X ENERGY!!!!! IF THERE ARE NO CHARACTERS ON YOUR BOARD, I GAIN Y ENERGY!!!!!

name: SANIC
text: EVERY 3RD ATTACK YOU TRIGGER IS TRIGGERED AN ADDITIONAL TIME!!!!!

name: Blahaj
text: Whenever this card is triggered, heal up to 3 HP.

name: Does He Know?
text: When setting this card, choose a type X. When this card is activated, if the type of the card opposite this is X, your next attack deals +Y damage.

name: Mind Focused On Profit
text: If neither character has taken damage in the last X actions, gain Y energy.

name: Scammed
text: If your opponent dealt you damage with their last action, heal up to 8 of that damage.

name: i sleep
text: Heal up to 10. If you heal for more than 5, skip your next action.

name: succ
text: Your opponent loses 2 HP. You gain 2 HP.
